messages.content: I am staying at the Singapore Mobility Gallery and would like to travel to Changi Airport MRT station. I prefer not to use any mode of transport other than the MRT. Please design a route with the shortest walking distance. Finally, please save all the stations (including the ones passed along the way) in sequential order to a file named routine.txt, with one station per line.

function.name: local-web_search
function.arguments: {"query":"Downtown Line station list DT12 to DT35 sequence Little India to Expo", "num_results": 5}

Snippet: The Downtown Line is the fifth MRT line in Singapore, running from Bukit Panjang to Expo via a CBD loop, with 35 stations. It is 41.9 km long.

messages.content:
Here’s the MRT-only route with minimal walking from Singapore Mobility Gallery:

- Walk about 2–4 minutes to Little India (DT12), the closest MRT station to 1 Hampshire Rd.
- Take the Downtown Line (towards Expo) from Little India (DT12) and stay on the train until Expo (DT35).
- At Expo (DT35), transfer within the station to the East West Line (Changi Airport branch) and take the train to Changi Airport (CG2).

This uses the nearest station (Little India) and only one interchange at Expo, keeping walking to a minimum.

I have saved all stations in travel order (one per line) to routine.txt:
- Path: /workspace/dumps/workspace/routine.txt
